metadata.dc:title: Figures of obsession
metadata.dc:description: This article is an approximation to the obsessive neurosis through the Freudian case of The man of the rats as well as The Hamletian doubt. It centers in the problematic of the obsessive as well as in the love phenomenon. It also deals with the feminine obsessive neurosis (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Wechsler, Elina
metadata.dc:description: Este artículo es un acercamiento a la neurosis obsesiva a través del caso freudiano del Hombre de las ratas y la duda hamletiana. Se centra en la problemática del obsesivo y el amor y recorre también la neurosis obsesiva femenina (AU)
metadata.dc:title: Figuras de la obsession
